name: Winter Jasmine
description: A hardy, fragrant shrub that blooms in the winter months.

name: Pansy
description: A colorful flower that thrives in the cooler months of winter and early spring.

name: Primrose
description: Bright, early-blooming flowers that are perfect for spring gardens.

name: Tulip
description: A popular spring flower with vibrant petals in many colors.

name: Sunflower
description: Large, bright yellow flowers that grow best in the summer heat.

name: Marigold
description: Hardy, easy-to-grow flowers that bloom in summer and early fall.

name: Chrysanthemum
description: A late-blooming flower that is often seen in the fall, perfect for the cooler weather.

name: Holly
description: An evergreen shrub with red berries, ideal for winter decoration.

name: Crocus
description: One of the first flowers to bloom in spring, signaling the end of winter.

name: Lavender
description: A fragrant, hardy plant that thrives in the summer sun.
